law.catch_line: Person claiming interest in unclaimed ticket may file claim after payment to racing commission.
law.text: Any person claiming an interest in any unclaimed pari-mutuel ticket which has been paid or surrendered to the racing commission in accordance with KRS 230.361 to 230.373 may file his claim to it at any time after it was paid to the racing commission.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 466, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 22, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1978.
